title: Bug 4971: Unexpected 'copy package' behavior
description: Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui, the package 'ui' is incorrectly included in the destination.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' operation, the destination directory (xx) contains a package named 'ui'.
EB: After performing the 'copy package' operation, the destination directory (xx) should not contain the package named 'ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui
2. Perform a 'copy package' operation
3. Select xxx as the destination
4. Verify that the package 'ui' is included in the destination directory (xx)
